description: Rebecca is a Pok√©mon trained that intended to compete in the Battle Tower, but Ash accidentally cut in front of her in the lineup. She befriended Brock, May, and Max in the audience when she began complaining over Ash`s interference. An intelligent and easily fascinated girl, Rebecca became interested in the entity of Deoxys that Tory Lund introduced them to. Rebecca concluded that the entity and Deoxys had the same energy patterns. She assisted in restoring energy to LaRousse City.
name: Hitomi
